channel.title: N D BHARATH
channel.description: Recent content on N D BHARATH

item.title: June 22nd
item.description: Installed Terraform on linux terminal, following steps given by this doc. Created new directory and created a new file main.tf with the terraform configuration. terraform init command allows Terraform to interact with Docker. terraform plan does a dry run of your configuration. terraform apply deploys changes according to main.tf.

item.title: My fourth post
item.description: Build site with github actions using a default template. Added project to circle ci. First bulid failed due to non existance of config.yml file. Added config.yml to required location with necessary content. Result: Build failed. Watched tutorials to understand CI/ CD properly.

item.title: My Third Post
item.description: Test sites with various themes. Tested how to add content and how changing various files would affect the site. -Ran site successfully

item.title: My Second Post
item.description:
Shifted from using vm on linux to dual boot linux. Downloaded hombrew as a package installer. Used homebrew to install hugo and asciinema. Created a new hugo site and made a local repository.
Used visual studio code for more comfortable interface. Authenticated github site with ssh key for more secure authentication. Used git init to make git repository.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Learnt the basics of Git and Github. I learnt how to write in markdown. Experimented with hosting HTML on github.

item.title: Technologies
item.description: TECHNOLOGIES LEARNT Hugo: Hugo is a static site generator. Unlike dynamic sites where the page is build dynamically when a visitor visits, hugo builds pages when you create or update it. Hugo is used commonly to build sites or company sites. asciinema: Records terminal output on command asciinema rec. Git: It is a version control system used to track changes in the source code. Git repository is the place where the snapshots are saved by commiting after sending to staging area.
My name is N D Bharath. I am a stusent at Bits Pilani Hyderabad Campus. I am a Computer Science student.
